body:
Ah, okay. I wanted to make sure I didn't misunderstand their license somewhere myself, is all.

> One possibility is distributing a separate .so and using dlopen(3).

That is basically the approach we took for Azul3D's OpenAL-soft [bindings](https://github.com/azul3d/native-al) on Windows/Linux/OSX (but we pack the dynamic library in the package and extract to the user's home directory).
